arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta confirms injury boost as Saliba returns to training ahead of Nottingham Forest clash
arts.sum: “I think the good thing is that the players want to remain here and they want to be a big part of the history of this club in the next few years. Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta has confirmed that William Saliba has returned to training, following a concerning ankle injury that he sustained against Liverpool.
